item.title: Bloomberg Analyst: US SEC Could Prepone Ark Bitcoin ETF Deadline
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto News: Questions have been raised about the timing of the upcoming U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) deadline the for ARK Invest Bitcoin ETF. item.title: Breaking: Gemini Relists XRP Token, Opens Support For XRP Ledger (XRPL)
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto News: After three years, crypto exchange Gemini on Thursday relisted XRP token and trading is active for several pairs including USD, GBP and EUR currencies. The exchange announced support for the XRP Ledger blockchain, with the Gemini API/FIX and ActiveTrader applications open for XRP/USD trading pairs. Meanwhile, the XRP price did not show much

The post Breaking: Gemini Relists XRP Token, Opens Support For XRP Ledger (XRPL) appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Coinbase Invests Into Rocket Pool; RPL Token To Reach $40 ?
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto News: Coinbase Ventures, the corporate investment arm of United States based crypto exchange Coinbase, on Thursday announced a strategic investment into Rocket Pool, a decentralised Ethereum staking protocol, through the purchase of RPL tokens. Coinbase said that over the last one year, it has been working closely with Rocket Pool cofounders Darren Langley and

item.title: Breaking: DCG Files Motion to Dismiss Gemini Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Crypto venture firm Digital Currency Group (DCG) has filed a motion requesting the dismissal of the lawsuit levied against the company and its founder Barry Silbert by the Winklevoss brothers’ cryptocurrency exchange Gemini.  The Gemini DCG Legal Showdown According to DCG’s legal team, the lawsuit is “a continuation of the Winklevoss’s year-long Twitter-based character assassination.” 

The post Breaking: DCG Files Motion to Dismiss Gemini Lawsuit appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto venture firm Digital Currency Group (DCG) has filed a motion requesting the dismissal of the lawsuit levied against the company and its founder Barry Silbert by the Winklevoss brothers’ cryptocurrency exchange Gemini.  The Gemini DCG Legal Showdown According to DCG’s legal team, the lawsuit is “a continuation of the Winklevoss’s year-long Twitter-based character assassination.”

item.description:
Web3.0 startup and stablecoin issuer, Circle has reported a better-than-expected financial performance for the first half of the year.  The Circle Revenue Boost Per a report from Bloomberg as propagated by Circle CEO, Jeremy Allaire, the company raked in a total of $779 million in the first half of this year. item.title: Breaking: Gemini Relists XRP Following Coinbase; Adds USD, GBP, EUR, Pairs
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
XRP News: Crypto exchange Gemini on Thursday made the much awaited announcement of the trading support to XRP. XRP token is now available for deposits on the exchange and the trading is available for USD, GBP, EUR, CAD, SGD, HKD, and AUD XRP pairs. The development comes after United States based crypto exchanges Coinbase, Kraken

item.title: Breaking: US CPI Inflation Comes In At 3.2%, Bitcoin And Ethereum Price To Rally?
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The annual CPI inflation for the month of July comes in at 3.2% against market expectations of 3.3%, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics. In addition, the Core CPI inflation comes in at 4.7% against market expectation of 4.8%, with the monthly rate also remaining at 0.2%. The annual inflation data coming in hotter than last month’s 3% gives

The post Breaking: US CPI Inflation Comes In At 3.2%, Bitcoin And Ethereum Price To Rally? appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The annual CPI inflation for the month of July comes in at 3.2% against market expectations of 3.3%, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics. In addition, the Core CPI inflation comes in at 4.7% against market expectation of 4.8%, with the monthly rate also remaining at 0.2%. item.title: Binance Delisting Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC), But There’s A Catch
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Thursday announces delisting of Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC) perpetual contacts next week. The exchange will adjust the leverage and margin tiers of ADABUSD and MATICBUSD perpetual contracts today and delist them after an automatic settlement as per the plan. Binance Delisting Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC) Perpetuals

The post Binance Delisting Cardano (ADA) And Polygon (MATIC), But There’s A Catch appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Just-In: FTX Creditors And Debtors’ Latest Dispute Overshadows Reorganization Plan
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
FTX Debtors under chief restructuring officer John J. Ray III criticized traders and market makers among the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors (UCC) for seeking control over assets. FTX debtors call the UCC’s plan to invest nearly $2.6 billion in cash reserves in short-term Treasuries a bad idea amid FTX 2.0 draft restructuring plan. FTX

item.title: Dogecoin Price Bullish Setup And The Climb To $0.1
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Dogecoin price appears to be the underdog of the top ten cryptos, with a rally seemingly brewing despite the mundane trading environment. item.title: Lawyer Says US SEC Challenging XRP ODL Sales Is A Big Concern For Ripple
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
US SEC seeks an interlocutory appeal to Judge Torres’ ruling that programmatic sales of XRP are not securities and to stay the district court proceedings, including the pretrial scheduling order. The SEC also challenges XRP on-demand liquidity (ODL) sales by Ripple as the company only sold XRP in connection with ODL transactions since the lawsuit

The post Lawyer Says US SEC Challenging XRP ODL Sales Is A Big Concern For Ripple appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: XRP Price Prediction: Can Bulls Tap $0.62 As Springboard To $1?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
XRP price performance in the last few weeks has trimmed a massive chunk of the gains accrued following the Ripple ruling in early July.
